price: They will say, “No! You are not welcome! You brought this on us. What a terrible place to settle in!”
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِكُمۡۖ أَنتُمۡ قَدَّمۡتُمُوهُ لَنَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡقَرَارُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
